contentfulProduct.seoDescription: The classic dress shirt that puts all others to shame. Made with the finest Supima 120's cotton, the smooth, polished fabric is typically found in only luxury or bespoke shirting,
contentfulProduct.title: 120s Supima Dress Shirt (w/ WrinkleGuard)

content.value: Buy 1, get any 2nd shirt for 50% off
Buy 2, get any 3rd shirt for free

The classic dress shirt that puts all others to shame. Where most dress shirts use a 60-80's count thread, we use the finest Supima 120's cotton, resulting in a much smoother, polished fabric is typically found in only luxury or bespoke shirting, The Sustainable bamboo collar stays and 30% recycled PET buttons make you feel good about feeling good.
100% Supima 120's Cotton 2-ply poplin. 120's fabric refers to the size of the thread in a fabric; the higher the number, the finer, softer, and smoother the fabric will be.
Butter-smooth fabric feel
WrinkleGuard technology - a wrinkle-resistant process that keeps the fabric soft without the constant creasing
Made with 3D fit technology for comfort and movement
Sustainable Bamboo removable collar-stays
Buttons made from 30% Recycled PET
Slim fit
Model is 6'1 and wearing a size Medium
Machine wash cold. Gentle cycle. Do not bleach. Tumble dry low. Cool iron or dry clean if needed.

productDetails.productDetails:
• 100% Supima 120's Cotton 2-ply poplin. 120's fabric refers to the size of the thread in a fabric; the higher the number, the finer, softer, and smoother the fabric will be.
  • Butter-smooth fabric feel
  • WrinkleGuard technology - a wrinkle-resistant process that keeps the fabric soft without the constant creasing
  • Made with 3D fit technology for comfort and movement
  • Sustainable Bamboo removable collar-stays
  • Buttons made from 30% Recycled PET
  • Slim fit
  • Model is 6'1 and wearing a size Medium

productDescription.productDescription: The classic dress shirt that puts all others to shame. Where most dress shirts use a 60-80's count thread, we use the finest Supima 120's cotton, resulting in a much smoother, polished fabric is typically found in only luxury or bespoke shirting, The Sustainable bamboo collar stays and 30% recycled PET buttons make you feel good about feeling good.

content.value: "Quince’s new rug collection is hand knotted and tufted by artisans in India. Best of all, the prices are fairly reasonable for the top-notch quality you’re getting."

Five-star reviews
What our customers are saying
What our customers are saying
"We've got you covered with this very affordable cashmere sweater that somehow clocks in at a miraculous 50 buckeroos."
"New Online Fashion Brand Aims To Get Eco-Friendly Clothes From Factory-To-Closet At Affordable Prices."
Quince Cashmere Robe
- The best robes of 2021."
"While D2C brands have changed the way we shop,
Quince
is looking to change retail even more dramatically."
"A cashmere crewneck for $50?! It’s now a reality — in 10 colors — thanks to Quince."
"The brand connects with factories to sell direct to the customer, promising consumers better prices and factories with better margins."
"The Quince Organic Percale Luxe Sheet Set collection is an excellent choice for anyone who sleeps hot at night."
"You can get a cashmere sweater for only $50 from this radically transparent basics company."
"My next plane outfit when I can travel again."
